node.title: About
node.description: As a kid I dabbled in making text based adventure games, but my first real exposure to code was through my studies of music technology at NYU. After several years of working in the music industry and playing in a band, I decided to take my interest in programming to the next level. After much self-learning, I eventually enrolled in General Assembly's Web Development Immersive program, where I spent around 12 hours a day for 3 months absorbing all the knowledge my brain could possibly hold. I am now a full stack developer, ready to build awesome stuff and still hungry to learn.
